title: ICE: -Zunpretty=hir "AST generic args printed by HIR pretty-printer"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
`./src/test/ui/issues/issue-43424.rs` ### Code ```Rust #![allow(unused)] macro_rules! m { ($attr_path: path) => { #[$attr_path] fn f() {} } } m!(inline); //~ ERROR: unexpected generic arguments in path fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.62.0-nightly (6dd68402c 2022-05-11) binary: rustc commit-hash: 6dd68402c5d7da168f87d8551dd9aed1d8a21893 commit-date: 2022-05-11 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.62.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.1 ``` ### Error output `rustc -Zunpretty=hir ./src/test/ui/issues/issue-43424.rs` ``` error: unexpected generic arguments in path --> ./src/test/ui/issues/issue-43424.rs:10:10 | 10 | m!(inline); //~ ERROR: unexpected generic arguments in path | ^^^^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'AST generic args printed by HIR pretty-printer', compiler/rustc_hir_pretty/src/lib.rs:136:9 ```
Backtrace
